events.name: Throwback Thursdays with DJ Manny Duke
events.description: Featuring deep cuts, party anthems and remixes nostalgic songs from two of the best decades of music with the very best music from the 90's and 2000's

events.name: Boom Dance Festival Experience
events.address: 966 Lexington Ave New York, New York(NY), 10021
events.performers: DJ LUCK & MC NEAT, NICKY BLACKMARKET, DJ NICKY BLACKMARKET, RATPACK
events.description: It's looking more and more like we will be seeing events return in the summer! To celebrate this we are arranging a festival experience to say good bye to lock down! We will also be celebrating the fact Zoom Dance is one year old!

events.name: Encore Night Boat Party
events.address: 675 Water St New York, New York(NY), 10002
events.description: Who is ready to party? I mean in the middle of the water, a boat with good music and drinks. If thats you then you have made it to the right place.

events.name: Jam Concert Live
events.address: 70 W 115th St New York, New York(NY), 10026
events.description: The most diverse dj on the east coast, DJ RNB team up once again to bring you the next installment in the high energy, Jam Concert Live series!

events.name: UnMute Rock Festival
events.address: 55 La Salle St #12K New York, New York(NY), 10027
events.performers: Big Wednesday, Black Pyre, Calling Apollo
events.description: With bands from around the UK ready to send the roof into orbit, get ready for the loudest Welsh festival: the inaugural UnMute 2021.

events.name: Soul Kitchen Party
events.address: 60 Gramercy Park N #2 New York, New York(NY), 10010
events.performers: A-Trak, Nightmares on Wax, Rakim, Jay Electronica
events.description: Dope party which features Hip Hop legends, emerging artists and world-class turntablists

events.name: Mystere By Cirque Du Soleil
events.venue: Treasure Island – TI Hotel & Casino, a Radisson Hotel
events.address: 3300 Las Vegas Blvd S, Las Vegas, NV 89109
events.description: Mystère by Cirque du Soleil provides a complete spectrum of awe-inducing entertainment with colorful sets, imaginative costumes and highly-skilled performers.

events.name: O By Cirque Du Soleil
events.address: 3600 S Las Vegas BlvdLas Vegas, NV 89109
events.description: O by Cirque du Soleil is an whimsical and visually stunning show that transports audiences into a fantastical world of wonderment and awe with the use stunning acrobatics surrounded by air, fire and, most prominently, water.

events.name: Criss Angel Mindfreak at Planet Hollywood
events.address: 3667 S Las Vegas BlvdLas Vegas, NV 89109
events.description: Be prepared to have your mind freaked by illusionist Criss Angel.

events.name: Blue Man Group
events.address: 3900 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89119
events.performers: Chris Wink, Phil Stanton, Matt Goldman
events.description: The avant-garde Blue Man Group combines theatrics, art, music and science to create an interactive, wild and percussion-driven experience full of humor and energy.

events.name: Jabbawockeez
events.address: 3799 S Las Vegas BlvdLas Vegas, NV 89109
events.performers: Kevin 'Kb' Brewer, Joe 'Punkee' Larot, Jeff 'Phi' Nguyen, Rynan 'Kid Rainen' Paguio
events.description: World famous dance crew Jabbawockeez presents an audio-visual story of inspiration brought to life through the group's signature movements and sound.

events.name: Tournment of Kings
events.address: 3850 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
events.performers: Kevin 'Kb' Brewer, Joe 'Punkee' Larot, Jeff 'Phi' Nguyen, Rynan 'Kid Rainen' Paguio
events.description: The medieval-themed Tournament of Kings Dinner & Show combines arena-style entertainment like jousting and sword fighting with a bacchanalian feast befitting a king.
